name: Deep Space Rush (itch)
description:
It's a game like what we played in arcade room ever.

When you use special weapon , the ship release all the missiles, it provide an extra protective cover, time duration depend on the number of missiles, but even a single missile it can provide a cover to avoid a lethal strike.

I developed this game together with my son , we polished it again & again , can't remember how many times, but I still like playing it .  So... I consider it a pretty fun game.

'0.9v230409 Design for stage2 was completed.',

'0.7v230323 Joystick and rumble supported.',

'0.6v230228 Original version.',
